sentences.sContent: Can I get the mommy giraffe for Christmas?
sentences.sCn: 我在圣诞节能得到一个长颈鹿妈妈吗？

sentences.sContent: If so, find you a giraffe of some sort and put it out in the fall.
sentences.sCn: 如果是这样的话，拿出你的长颈鹿并把它在秋天里展示出来。

trans.tranOther: a tall African animal with a very long neck and legs and dark spots on its yellow-brown fur
